pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods for High-Dimensional Multi-View Learning // Methods for high-dimensional multi-view learning based on the multi-view stacking (MVS) framework. For technical details on the MVS and stacked penalized logistic regression (StaPLR) methods see Van Loon, Fokkema, Szabo, De Rooij (2020) doi:10.1016/j.inffus.2020.03.007 and Van Loon et al. (2022) doi:10.3389/fnins.2022.830630.
